shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the CDN streaming state changes.

p.codeblock: void onDirectCdnStreamingStateChanged( DirectCdnStreamingState state, DirectCdnStreamingError error, String message);
DECLARE_DYNAMIC_MULTICAST_DELEGATE_ThreeParams(FOnDirectCdnStreamingStateChanged, EDIRECT_CDN_STREAMING_STATE, state, EDIRECT_CDN_STREAMING_ERROR, error, FString, message);
public virtual void OnDirectCdnStreamingStateChanged(DIRECT_CDN_STREAMING_STATE state, DIRECT_CDN_STREAMING_ERROR error, string message) { }
final void Function( DirectCdnStreamingState state, DirectCdnStreamingError error, String message)? onDirectCdnStreamingStateChanged;

section.p: When the host directly pushes streams to the CDN, if the streaming state changes, the SDK triggers this callback to report the changed streaming state, error codes, and other information. You can troubleshoot issues by referring to this callback.

plentry.pd: The current CDN streaming state. See .
The information about the changed streaming state.
